note.title: Our philosophy:

features1.title: What You Get
features1.contentDesc: Focused on identifying meaningful opportunities — not constant noise.

features1.items.title: Market Analysis
features1.items.description: Detects trends and structural market shifts using objective price data, removing subjective bias.

features1.items.title: Adaptive Behavior
features1.items.description: Adjusts logic dynamically as market conditions shift, so you don't have to constantly tweak settings.

features1.items.title: Automated Execution
features1.items.description: Trades are executed instantly according to your rules, eliminating hesitation and emotional errors.

features2.contentDesc: Built to protect capital and enforce consistency.

features2.items.title: Risk Controls
features2.items.description: Integrated safeguards help limit drawdowns and control exposure automatically.

features2.items.title: Overtrading Protection
features2.items.description: Reduces trading activity during low-quality or choppy market phases to preserve capital.

features2.items.title: Configurable Parameters
features2.items.description: Risk levels and strategy behavior can be fully adjusted to match your risk appetite.

steps.title: Simple by Design
steps.subtitle: The strategy runs directly on TradingView. It continuously scans price data, validates signals against your rules, and executes positions independently — freeing you from the screen.

steps.items.title: Data — Indicator Signal
steps.items.description: Our proprietary indicator scans the market 24/7. It generates a signal only when high-probability criteria are met.

steps.items.title: Logic — Signal to Trade
steps.items.description: Signals are instantly converted into structured trade instructions. The system automatically validates direction, position size, and risk settings.

steps.items.title: Execution — Order Placement
steps.items.description: Validated instructions are executed immediately. Orders are placed with precision, strictly following your defined risk parameters.

chart.title: Built on Data
chart.subtitle: Backed by extensive testing on historical data. The strategy is built to withstand trending, ranging, and volatile environments, focusing on realistic growth and controlled risk rather than curve-fitted optimization.

faqs.title: Good to Know
faqs.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions.

faqs.items.title: Which markets and timeframes are supported?
faqs.items.description: Our strategy is optimized for Bitcoin but can be applied to other volatile assets and timeframes above 4 hours.

faqs.items.title: How does the system handle market volatility?
faqs.items.description: The strategy adapts dynamically to changing market conditions, maintaining stability even during turbulent periods.

faqs.items.title: Are all trades profitable?
faqs.items.description: No. Not every trade will be profitable. The system uses intelligent risk management to minimize losses and protect your capital.

faqs.items.title: Is the system suitable for beginners?
faqs.items.description: Yes. Fully automated operation and intuitive design make it easy to start — no prior experience required.

faqs.items.title: How do I access the strategy?
faqs.items.description: After subscribing, you can run and manage the strategy directly through your account — quick and straightforward.

faqs.items.title: Can I customize the strategy?
faqs.items.description: Yes. Key parameters such as risk profile and trading behavior can be adjusted to match your preferences.

faqs.items.title: Is my capital safe?
faqs.items.description: Yes. The system does not access your wallet or funds. You retain full control over your investments at all times.

faqs.items.title: How much does the system cost?
faqs.items.description: We offer subscription plans tailored to different needs — transparent, fair, and performance-oriented.

faqs.items.title: Is there a trial version?
faqs.items.description: Yes. You can test the strategy free for 7 days to evaluate its performance. After the trial, you can choose a subscription that fits your trading style.

faqs.items.title: What kind of support is provided?
faqs.items.description: Our support team is available 24/7 via chat and email to assist you whenever needed.

cta.subtitle: Automate your strategy, enforce discipline, and eliminate the guesswork. Experience systematic trading on TradingView today.
